name: 悟道（体验版）
description:
If you had the opportunity to freely travel to any era, which historical dynasty would you choose to go to? Perhaps one can try to choose the Ming Dynasty, which can be considered a brilliant period in Chinese history. During this period, significant progress and development were made in the fields of politics, economy, culture, and technology. The political system, economic system, cultural prosperity, and technological achievements of the Ming Dynasty have all left rich legacies for future generations.
Interactive novel game: Wudao is a work based on interactive novel games, with a core experience of engaging storyline dialogue and main tasks. This game is based on a senior historical research team, and its plot is closely adapted from the real life trajectory of the founder of psychology, Mr. Wang Yangming.
Main storyline elements: As a traveler, you will accompany Wang Yangming on a journey from the bustling and bustling capital to the remote and lonely central Guizhou. In this journey, you will experience the ups and downs of historical plots throughout, meet many real historical figures, and have the opportunity to communicate and interact with them. In the arduous and tortuous journey, we witnessed the birth of Yangming's philosophy together.
Side Story Elements: In the game world, in addition to the main storyline, you can also explore the cultural backgrounds of different regions and experience a variety of side quests. Side quests are more presented in the form of short stories, allowing you to feel the charm of history in a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere.
Collecting elements: By playing main and side quests, you can collect various historical character cards, books, cultural items, and other content. These contents not only enrich the gaming experience, but also allow you to learn about rich historical and cultural aspects in the game.
